definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Base from steel plate and welded into a channel for supporting the shell and gear.
sentences.chinese: 底座由钢板与槽钢焊成，用于支撑壳体及传动装置。

sentences.english: Planetary drive with double trochoid and free rollers is a new type of drive.
sentences.chinese: 双摆线滚子行星传动是一种新型的传动装置。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses an electric hydraulic baler for bank notes, which relates to a gearing device.
sentences.chinese: 电动液压钞票压捆装置，涉及一种传动装置。

sentences.english: The most common chart drive makes one revolution in 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 最普遍使用的记录纸传动装置24小时旋转1圈。

sentences.english: The valve actuating device is installed in another room.
sentences.chinese: 阀门传动装置安装在另一舱室。

sentences.english: Execute test procedures to qualify mechanical components in the commodities of motor, gear and fan.
sentences.chinese: 对电机，传动装置或者风扇等料件进行测试。

sentences.english: The micro motion drive unit is a highly refined screw-driven hydraulic jack .
sentences.chinese: 微形传动装置是一个极精制的螺杆用液压作动筒。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a driving device with a screw rod.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种丝杠传动装置。

sentences.english: The liquid-viscous driving device is a new kind of stepless speed regulation gear.
sentences.chinese: 液体黏性传动装置是一种新型的无级调速传动装置。

sentences.english: The liquid-viscous driving device is a new kind of stepless speed regulation gear.
sentences.chinese: 液体黏性传动装置是一种新型的无级调速传动装置。

sentences.english: Closeups of the tank construction, gearing and servos.
sentences.chinese: 特写的坦克建设，传动装置和伺服。

sentences.english: The engine is cogged to the wheels by the transmission.
sentences.chinese: 这个引擎经传动装置被卡榫到轮子。

sentences.english: Evidence of leak on right main landing gear.
sentences.chinese: 右侧着陆主传动装置有裂隙迹象。

sentences.english: Design of magnetic circuit is an important link.
sentences.chinese: 磁路设计是密封传动装置中的重要设计环节。

sentences.english: The new type three-ring reducer can be used as drive mechanism of pumping units.
sentences.chinese: 该新型减速器可用作抽油机的传动装置。

sentences.english: A special type vehicle's main transmission shaft of transmission equipments fractured during test-drive.
sentences.chinese: 某特种车辆在试车过程中传动装置主传动轴断裂失效。
